posts.post_content:
I have a lot of four 1890's postal cards, each from a well known candy/chocolate maker of the era. A few of which are associated with baseball cards.

Two F. W. Rueckheim(the originator of Cracker Jacks). 1890 & 1891
One Flohr-Walters 1890 and Hawley & Hoops 1891(later bought out by Mars Bros.

Very early examples.

$59.99 for the four delivered. Check, MO, PP F/F or Zelle
